name: Ultrablast
description:
* Now updated for iOS 7.1, with iPhone 5, iPad Air & 64-bit support.

Follow the story of four characters as they investigate the mysterious phenomenon affecting their home planet. Perhaps you will be able to solve the mystery. By shooting things. And lots of them.

Ultrablast is an oldschool shoot'em up! It features smooth gameplay, an unusual story, stats and achievements, Game Center, and an awesome neo-retro soundtrack!

Reviews:

"There are quite a few scrolling shooters to choose from on the App Store, and right off the bat Ultrablast sets itself among the best simply by getting so much right." - Gamasutra, FingerGaming, 4/5

"Ultrablast steps back from trying to be yet another arcade shmup title and throws in a simple, but effective combat system and storyline to keep you hooked till the end." - AppSpy, 4/5

"You need to just go buy this game. It is *extremely* well produced, like crazy", "Graphics are fantastic", "Every aspect of this game is really really well-polished" - TouchGen

Featured in Norway's national newspaper Dagbladet.
